tool_description: Slugify your text with different languages
name: Slugger
title: Slugger

api_list.name: Create slug
api_list.description:
Endpoint creates slug from provided text. API has ability to provide different slugs for different languages as example:

English:   
  `This & that` 
  -> 
  `this-and-that`

German:
 `Das & Der` 
  -> 
  `das-und-der`

Slugs are url friendly can be used:
  * websites in order to get better SEO, 
  * databases
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://slugger.p.rapidapi.com/slugify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "slugger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://slugger.p.rapidapi.com/slugify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "slugger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
